statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.ServerName , AA.Description FROM dbo.ADServer AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND AA.ServerName LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%'
ORDER BY ROW_NO
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.ADServer ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, ServerName, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #ServerName#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.ADServer SET UpdateDate = #UpdateDate# , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName#
, ServerName = #ServerName# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
